Articles.Content:
hey i came up with a lander idea and i think it is prity good but since im waiting for the full game to be shiped i have to use the demo so it dose not have any landing gear but i think it will be really good after that so here is the lander

sry for spelling
Pics?
Kerbalnaut\'s right coolsnap, a lot of players would like to see pics of your craft before they download it, I recommend you upload some to Imgur, and then link them to your original post.
i know i dont have any pics but i dont know how to but ill try
Press f1 and KSP will take a screenshot.
its up now thx!
Is this only a fuel tank with S.A.S and engine???
no it has the command module with some winglets and some rcs on it

some rcs on it

But it has no RCS fuel
its right above the sas
It can\'t land.
i know it still needs some landing gear since im still in the demo
Those fins will be useless on the Mun. There is no atmosphere.
thx forgot ill make a new download link

The main problem is that the actual landing legs aren\'t long enough to go with anything but the smaller engine and fuel tank. After that, it\'s pretty much the tried-and-true basic lander design, so I suppose it\'s pretty good.
What do you mean by waiting for the full game to be shipped? You do realize you can download right after you buy it, right?

i know it still needs some landing gear since im still in the demo

I made a Mun lander that uses winglets as landing gear in this post. Check it out.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7499.msg108734#msg108734

i know it still needs some landing gear since im still in the demo

winglets make for great landing gear if you are still on the pre-preorder version, that\'s how I did my landings before the pre-order versions came out works a charm, I still use them they are plain better than the legs.

May I suggest less height and a wider base for a lander too.

A vid of mine in 13.x using winglets for landing legs

Cheers!
thanks trbinsc i did not see the little butun at all!!! oh ya thanks for the tip Innsewerants and nice landing!
